title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, CodeLlama, …) behind a REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, generate, embed, list, pull, push models in 3 lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers (fetch-based) published on npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama LLM & embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama backends; Docker one-liner install.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with POJO model mapping and reactive streams.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Async Rust crate wrapping Ollama’s REST API with strong typing and tokio streams.

title: Ollama-GUI (rtzll/ollama-gui)
summary: Lightweight React/Electron desktop GUI to chat with local Ollama models.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Chainlit cookbook showing how to build shareable LLM apps backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot (modelcontextprotocol/ollama-copilot)
summary: VS-Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s slot.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator & OllamaEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-camunda-worker
summary: Camunda 8 job worker that calls Ollama for human-task summarisation & email drafting.

title: ollama-cli-chat (kieran/ollama-cli-chat)
summary: Terminal UI chat (Go) with bubbletea, markdown & conversation persistence.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag (glangchain/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal Go example of RAG using Ollama embeddings & Weaviate vector store.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into threads; configurable roles & model limits.

title: ollama-nim-client
summary: Pure Nim client library for Ollama with async HTTP and std/json support.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger CI module to spin up Ollama service containers for pipeline testing.

title: ollama-csharp (bearyinnovative/ollama-csharp)
summary: Community C# SDK for .NET 6+ with async enumerable streaming and DI-friendly client.

title: ollama-model-library (tenyx/ollama-model-library)
summary: Curated Modelfile collection for fine-tuned chat, code, and multilingual variants.
